resources.string:
1. Enter the recipient's mobile number with country code (91XXXXXXXXXX) and an optional message.
2. Tap the "Send" button.
3. The app will open WhatsApp with the entered contact number and pre-filled message.
4. Directly send the message without saving the number.
5. Enjoy hassle-free and efficient communication via WhatsApp.
6. Developer Contact: harshbhanderi228@gmail.com
